TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Mark of the Wild
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by [@value]%, and increases all of your total attributes by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Natures Focus
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Healing Touch, Wrath, Entangling Roots, Cyclone, Nourish, Regrowth and Tranquility by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Furor
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you [@value]% chance to gain [@value2] Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form, and you keep up to [@value3] Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form, and increases your total Intellect while in Moonkin form by [@value4]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Naturalist
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by [@value] sec and increases the physical damage you deal by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Subtlety
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the threat generated by your restoration spells by [@value]% and reduces the chance your healing over time spells will be dispelled by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Natural Shapeshifter
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 30%.also redzuces your global cooldown of your Bear Form, Dire Bear Form and Cat Form by 0.5 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Intensity
TalentsTiers.Description: Allows [@value]% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting and causes your Enrage ability to instantly generate [@value2] rage.

TalentsTiers.Name: Omen of Clarity
TalentsTiers.Description: Each of the Druid's damage, healing spells and auto attacks have a chance of causing the caster to enter a Clearcasting state. The Clearcasting state reduces the Mana, Rage or Energy cost of your next damage, healing spell or offensive ability by 100%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Master Shapeshifter
TalentsTiers.Description:
Grants an effect which lasts while the Druid is within the respective shapeshift form.

Bear form - Increases physical damage by [@value]%

Cat form - Increases critical strike chance by [@value2]%

Moonkin form - Increases spell damage by [@value3]%

Tree of Life form - Increases healing by [@value4]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Tranquil Spirit
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch, Nourish and Tranquility spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Rejuvenation
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Natures Swiftness
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
3 min cooldown

When activated, your next Druid Nature spell with a casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.

TalentsTiers.Name: Gift of Nature
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effect of all nature healing spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Tranquility
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces threat caused by Tranquility by [@value]%, and reduces the cooldown by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Empowered Touch
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Healing Touch spell gains an additional [@value]% and your Nourish spell gains an additional [@value2]% of your bonus healing effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Regrowth
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth and Nourish spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Living Spirit
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Spirit by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Swiftmend
TalentsTiers.Description:
13% of base mana
40 yd range

Instant Cast
15 sec cooldown

Consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect on a friendly target to instantly heal them an amount equal to 12 sec. of Rejuvenation or 18 sec. of Regrowth.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Natural Perfection
TalentsTiers.Description: Your critical strike chance with all spells is increased by [@value]% and critical strikes against you give you the Natural Perfection effect reducing all damage taken by [@value2]%.  Stacks up to [@value3] times.  Lasts [@value4] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Empowered Rejuvenation
TalentsTiers.Description: The bonus healing effects of your Druid healing over time spells is increased by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Living Seed
TalentsTiers.Description: When you critically heal your target with Swiftmend, Regrowth, Nourish or Healing Touch spell you have a [@value]% chance to plant a Living Seed on the target for [@value2]% of the amount healed. The Living Seed will bloom when the target is next attacked. Lasts [@value3] sec.,

TalentsTiers.Name: Replenish
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Rejuvenation and Wild Growth spells have a [@value]% chance to restore [@value2] Energy, [@value3] Rage, [@value4]% Mana or [@value5] Runic Power per tick.

TalentsTiers.Name: Tree of Life
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant Cast
Reduces the mana cost of your healing over time spells by 20% and grants the ability to shapeshift into the Tree of Life. While in this form you increase healing received by 6% for all party and raid members within 100 yards, and you can only cast Restoration spells in addition to Innervate, Barkskin, Nature's Grasp and Thorns spells.

The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Tree of Life
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your armor contribution from items while in Tree of Life Form by [@value]%, and increases your healing spell power by [@value2]% of your spirit while in Tree of Life Form.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Barkskin
TalentsTiers.Description: Grants [@value]% additional armor contribution from cloth and leather items while in Travel Form or while not shapeshifted. Increases the damage reduction granted by your Barkskin spell by [@value2]% and reduces the chance your Barkskin is dispelled by [@value3]%

TalentsTiers.Name: Gift of the Earthmother
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your spell haste by [@value]% and reduces the base cooldown of your Lifebloom spell by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Wild Growth
TalentsTiers.Description:
19% of base mana
40 yd range

Instant Cast
6 sec cooldown

Heals up to 5 friendly party or raid members within 15 yards of the target for 1442 over 7 sec. The amount healed is applied quickly at first, and slows down as the Wild Growth reaches its full duration.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks
